author: Naylus
title: Birds to Fishes
review:
Got this small buildable figure back in 1995 or 1996 together with so-called Magic Chest box from Milky Way. A small paper container included the chocolate sweet and a variety of such small polybags, which usually included animals, birds, fishes or transport.

This particular set contains a few basic bricks, one with a pair of eyes to create different creatures, such as a penguin, a duck, a fish or anybody else. The polybag itself doesn't present anything peculiar and is intended for a fast build and play with possible combining with other similar creatures or major Lego sets. 

Below is a small picture of how such Milky Way chests looked like back in 1990s (thanks for the picture to this video review)
